text: CCSS.Math.Content.HSF.BF.B.3 Identify the effect on the graph of replacing f ( x ) by f ( x ) + k , k  f ( x ), f ( kx ), and f ( x + k ) for specific values of k (both positive and negative); find the value of k given the graphs. Experiment with cases and illustrate an explanation of the effects on the graph using technology. Include recognizing even and odd functions from their graphs and algebraic expressions for them.
CCSS.Math.Content.HSF.BF.B.5 (+) Understand the inverse relationship between exponents and logarithms and use this relationship to solve problems involving logarithms and exponents.
